Replies.Reply: Open on ABEL MORALES. It is early morning and still almost dark out. He has a rugged yet prosperously-handsome face and is in his mid-thirties. He is struggling to get started with his morning jog.
Do you think I am ready to move into sales?
I... I'm not sure I will be able...
Did you get the truck back?
Cathy! They are coming again. Over.
Get the fuck away from me!
I threw it in the river.
Why is this putting everything at risk?
Trust me... I am not... I'm sorry.
Fuck you. I have nothing. And somehow you've ended up with everything you wanted.
What is that supposed to mean?
I'm sorry. You gave me a very good chance. Right?
Probably a better chance than I deserved.
Please take care of my family.
We don't have any more money so what else could I do.
You've been telling me not to do this for a year.
I have been looking over my fence at this property for a very long time.
No... I imagine I want it for the same reason you did.
I like to own the things I use.
You have done a beautiful job here.
I mean it. You and your men should be very proud.
Most people don't have anything beautiful like this to show for their day's work. You are a lucky man.
Well I thank you... my family will be very happy here.
Now I think I owe you some money.
And the tile in the master bath...
Have the police been here yet?
These fucking guys. This poor kid has been working his ass off.
No...don't talk to him or your father.
I'm meeting with the D.A. in the morning.
We'll pick you up when they let you out of here.
These men are cowards. Too weak to make a living... or even fight with their own hands, and too stupid to think up anything else to do.
So you guys have done what you needed to?
You just said you've done what you needed to... so what was it that you've done?
My people are at risk just driving around in this city, just trying to do their jobs. And I... I have done everything you have asked of me.
First, please know that we respect the work you are doing to try to help our business and the city. But also know I have never taken anything I haven't earned from anyone so when you say you've...
We are on the same side here.
Well, it makes a difference to me.
You have your job to do. But know that you are wrong and that we will take advantage of every opportunity to prove that.
I am always trying to expand my business.
Every new market is a difficult market.

But my driver was assaulted and my truck and oil were stolen in broad daylight in front of fifteen toll collectors and six police officers yesterday. And yet no one saw anything. That is a problem... no?
The DA... He said he's going to bring down charges on us next week.
Right now they are just saying us.
I'm very sorry this happened. Do you need anything else?
If you do, you call the office...
We are, thanks for your concern.
Any new market is a tough one. I'll see you.
May we be happy, prosperous and safe here. Cheers.
Peter... it's official as of yesterday.
He's from Ohio. Played football. I like my drivers to fit in with the neighborhood...
Just picked up a few new accounts over there. Weekend houses of some old clients from in the city.
It's not set up yet... So I am guessing this isn't good news here on a Sunday night.
That describes many people at this point.
As of tomorrow I'll have my new radio hooked up though so you should be able to reach me wherever I am...
Quiet. It's nothing. Come down here.
A lot of help you were.
What do you mean, how am I supposed to know who it was?
I think it was just some punk, looking to rip us off.
Ouch! If they had wanted to send a message he could have... and he didn't.
Please. Don't get going on this. We are a big new house. He probably wanted the TV. He didn't have a gun, he had nothing. The alarm will be in on Monday. It was some kid.
What you are looking for here is the opening to the burn chamber.
When this door opens you begin to close. It must always be spotless.
Now, you do this and only this...
Don't look up at them. Just at the cloth.

It means you are close... Then after sitting in silence way longer than is comfortable, you turn. And say "I'd love to run a few numbers for you. Is there somewhere more comfortable we could sit." They will almost always take you to the dining room table and will offer you something. And whatever it is you always take the fancy option.
I'd love a lemonade, thank you.

Because, we are never going to be the cheapest option, so we have to be the best. And they want... no, need... to feel that you want the best too. That's why our trucks are the newest or cleanest, and our drivers are approachable.
I gotta go, but the final point I will make is the hardest one. Once you have done the math and shown them what we can save them over the long haul through proper maintenance, you need them to sign.
You stare longer than you should.
Well... it was great to meet you.

Good morning. First off, I picked up Julian yesterday and he is back home and doing much better. And I just wanted to make sure you are all aware that we are doing everything we can to deal with this situation. We are working with law enforcement, and they seem to be closing in on these guys. But, sadly these are the times we are living in and we must rise above them. So, on that front we have these.

These will be in every truck by the end of the week. Much to my wife's concern I spent some serious coin and we now have our own closed channel that shouldn't have any blackout areas. You will always be in contact with us.

Replies.Didascalie: (CONT'D) (a hand goes up in the BACK)

Replies.Reply: We have been in constant contact with the union and they aren't considering any new course of action at this time.
Let me see that. I'll take care of this.
I don't know, but I will take care of it.
You are not to tell your father about this.
That truck just went out filthy.
You need to get home and start going through our set of books. How far back are they going?
I would have come to see you.
Good. I would love you to help on this. Because I can't have it going on any longer either.
They are taking shots at me because I am growing, expanding, getting stronger not weaker.
Well, it appears that you can't.
I agree. But these are truck drivers, not soldiers, this will lead to chaos.
It may seem that way... but if you are weak eventually it will show...
I said I wouldn't do it.
Are you really serious with this, this is what it's come to, walking around outside like fucking gangsters?
These men, they work for me. These trucks they drive, the customers they serve. They are here because we built this.
What are you even talking about here?
These men are fucking truck drivers. This is insane. You know who is gonna get it in the end here, me. This comes back to me.

It will be the end of everything I have worked for. If one of these guys shoots somebody it's me they will bring down for it...I'll talk to him... And we need to close this deal. We can't stay like this any longer. We must close on that property... We are so weak right now.
Because I have my entire savings at risk with this deposit. It is everything.
I've thought about it every day for the last five years. This place was sitting over that fence mocking....
I don't know what you mean.
I know what you are asking and no... I never ask myself why I do this. It just feels right...
We've been better... but we are good.
But you should know Arthur that this man has been digging through our industry for over two years looking for anything he can find.
...Don't think for a moment that I am going to allow this mess to interfere with our plan to grow. We need to know you are standing by us.
That's a very good question. This property gives us many things...
... is that when it feels scary to jump Ian... that is exactly when you must jump... or you risk ending up staying in the same place your whole life... and that I can't do.
Yes. Arthur is a good man.
Okay then... what is this gun?
You must be a bigger fucking idiot than I even thought. You are trying to protect your children? Protect them? Do you have any idea what happens if you get caught using that thing?

You dress yourself up in these fancy clothes, and look at you here in your mansion. I've given you everything you could possibly want but you still can't stop thinking like the Brooklyn corner-store gangster's daughter that you are.
Where is this thing? Let me see it.
Let me see it. Is this going to make you safe?
You know who uses guns like this?
It's a trap... and you are walking right into it... You need to get that thing out of our house.
I understand. But as you can see this is a terrible time for us. I am having my daughter's birthday party.
I'm going to kill this guy.
Maria. Keep the kids playing for a few minutes.
Do we even need to be doing this?
Is that the last one. Get back out there.
You'll do great. Remember... When you get them there. Hold the eye contact longer than you would like... but you watch what happens.
It is good to see you back here.
Are you ready to get back to work?
Good... Because you are. We all are. Someone came to my house a couple nights ago to rob me...

I tried to chase them away... but really there's nothing I can do. I am vulnerable. We all are. They can come back tonight. But to succeed and be great you must keep going back. And I know what all these guys want to be doing. But it doesn't make you any safer.
And then they will come after me with everything they have... So this is what we do. And the times will get better and safer. They will. So go. You are strong just by going. Stronger in fact.
I need to speak with you.
This has gotten out of control...
My wife and children were home at the time.
Yes. I managed to chase him off.
I need to know who is doing this.
It's one thing to come after my trucks and drivers... and to steal from me... but this... it's different.
Have you ever dealt with anything like this?
I refuse to live my life that way.
Anyone with more than 20k of storage. Can I count on you being there?
Hold that... it's not done yet...
Thank you for seeing me. I want more than this...
Joanne it's me. What are you talking about... what shots?
I need to make sure you know that we had nothing to do with this.
Thank you for coming... This is not right.
And you are aware of the position this is putting me in?
I paid off my first loan to you eleven years ago.
Do you remember the term on that loan?
I had seven years to pay you back.
Do you know how long it took me to pay you off?
I put 40 percent down as a deposit on this. It's all we had.
It does matter, that you know we didn't do this.
It means we need to find the money somewhere else.
You are thirteen years old. What are you doing? Your mother asks you an hour ago to help her get out of the house smoothly and you are acting like an...
What? What? What are you talking about?

I'm not sure who the hell you think you are, but you don't talk to me that way... You are in serious danger of becoming a rich little spoiled brat and I can tell you from experience there is nothing worse in the world than a rich little girl who thinks the whole world revolves around her.
that's a business I want to be in.
Well it was for me...how is it?
I got us a three more days... and one piece... from Saul. But we're still about a million short.
I have always been much more scared of failure than anything else.
Not today... but by the end of the week... maybe.
That does not have to be true.
I'm gonna try to get us a little more time.
I know our agreement doesn't allow for that. But... I need more time.
Thank you for asking. Many, many reasons.
I talked to the Hasid, I got us three days.
All the drivers could have us on scales. Why?
Thank you for letting me in.
You know we were going to support him. I do not know why he ran.
Yes. Well this time that hasn't worked out.

I know. It makes me very sad, because he is a very talented young man. But there are some decisions that you cannot come back from. I need to know where he is. And I need him to turn himself in. His actions are hurting me and my business. And I refuse to let other people's weaknesses hurt me. I don't know how it has come to this, but it has. If he does the right thing I will help to take care of his responsibilities. You and your family. When you see him. Tell him this. Please.
Money? Has he taken money out of your bank account?
You need to start looking into these things. It is very important that we find him safely.
I understand why you lied, but it is not smart.
There are other people looking for him. I am as good an option as he has. Know this.
Thank you both for agreeing to meet with me.
I think we have met before but I didn't realize you were Saul's Granddaughter.
I'm sorry to ask but how old are you?

I understand. And I hope that your Grandfather was able to communicate to you how much I have always respected him. And it was only out of respect for the business he had built, and because I knew of his reservations and feelings about your uncles and your father that I made those offers.
But, I am not here to offer to buy your company.
As I'm sure you will soon learn some years are good... others not so. I am in contract with a significant hard deposit at risk to purchase the old Bayfront terminal.
And due to circumstances beyond my control my bank has left me at the altar.
So, I am here, hat in hand, looking for a loan. I certainly expect the terms to be in your favor as I could not be at a weaker place.
SAUL and his GRANDDAUGHTER look at each other. They say nothing but clearly know each other well.
Peter... thank you... That may be true.

But over the last six months 110,000 gallons of fuel has been stolen from my family and I. Now the reason we asked Bill to get you all here is because the people in this room are the only people within two hundred miles of here who have the ability to purchase and store that kind of quantity.
Well it was for me...how is it?
I got us a three more days... and one piece... from Saul. But we're still about a million short.
How are the girls? I feel like I haven't seen them in days.
Your friend is dead... who do you work for.
Jimmy, can you give me a minute?
I've just come to collect that check you owe me.
That's how much has been taken from me over the last six months.
Your Far Rockaway facility bought a load of fuel last week off one of my stolen trucks.
But that was just one load, so every truck that has left my lot for the last two weeks has been marked with dye that I've put in...
My goal was to have you out of business by the end of next year.

When you find out who else it was you can get them to pay you back the difference. Kinda makes you miss having your father around? But I need the whole lot tomorrow or the feds will be at your doorstep by noon.
I didn't either... I didn't mean to take you away.
The girls at this place... they are so beautiful?
I don't know how you get anything done around here.
I'm in a bit of a rough patch.
I need your signature on this.
I need to take out a short term mortgage on our apartment building.
I'm up against it a bit. It will be fine.
Thank you... It's good to see your face.
The one guy didn't make it out of the crash, and the other guy disappeared.
Thank you. And thanks for seeing me.
Yes... but if I don't get it...
He seemed good... But the girls up at that place are...
I can tell you the girls didn't look like that where I went to school...
We can probably pull it off. Three different parties... it'll be a mess... and the terms... Peter suddenly showed me his true colors.
I spent my whole life trying not to become a gangster...
...And now... on the biggest deal in my career they will all control me.
What do you expect me to do with this?

It means if you walked into the office of the people who have been trying to put us in jail right now and slapped a check from that account down on their desk would it push me further into hell or help to get me out?
Well it sounds like you should take this money and keep it right where it is... because I'm going to pretend that we never had this conversation. And you can use that when they drag me off to jail!
I'll get it done. And it won't be as a cheat.
We'll use the money... your money.
I guess there is still some fuel in two of the tanks... they gave us a fair price on it.
To you too. Did you know...about the money?
I thought you said you threw that into the river?
I know what you wanted. But you need to forget that. You are looking backward. Only look forward, that is what you can control.
Yeah. For a while I thought he was... it's just...
You really do have to be lucky.
I was right there... I couldn't help myself.
Well, thank you for coming. I wanted to make sure this was handled correctly.
I'm not sure how I got here.
So... I should tell you that I won't be able to take that deal you offered. There is no way I would ever accept a felony charge for anything we've done.
But I also can't have you digging around my life and keeping this hanging around my neck for the next ten years. I love fighting a good battle but this... it's very bad for my business.
So, we need to come to some sort of conclusion.
Within my business it has that potential.
It doesn't feel that way... But please know that I have always chosen the path that was the most right.
The result is never in question for me. Just what path do I take to get there. And I have never questioned my path. There is always one that is most right. And that is what this is.
He was left in the middle of the highway without a truck, they brought him in.
Not for a couple days... Can I speak with you outside?
Do you want me to speak to my Brother about this?
It will if we don't do something.
Oh, fuck the D.A. He's more interested in coming after us than helping us.
It's not fair to them. You're at war here.
And you're going out to check on the new house?
We follow standard industry practice on every front.
I need to know what they are saying we did.
I know it has been a long road, and that not all of you wanted to do this, but thank you. For me...
We follow standard industry practice on every front.
I need to know what they are saying we did.
Thank you for coming by Andrew.
It only cost him a year of the kid's tuition.
Seems like a message was sent loud and clear.
Where did you get this? Catherine where did you find this?
A gun... It's a gun Abel.
Your youngest daughter found it in the bushes outside our front door.
It's loaded... with the safety off.
Those weren't kids looking to rip off our TV Abel, that was a fucking goon with a loaded gun looking in our windows! What the hell is going on here?
Damn right we will. Who is this?

What does that mean you will take care of it. This isn't a brick through our car window or some other cute little warning that I've put up with in the past. This is your daughter playing with a loaded gun!
You better. Because you won't like what's going to happen once I start getting involved.
I found a gun outside our front door. Somebody left it there last night.
Andrew can I talk to you for a minute.

Well that's exactly right. And we wanted to sit down with you tonight to make sure we were being totally up-front with everything that is going on and make sure that you understand the nature of the complaints and are comfortable that it is not going to affect our business in an adverse way.
Hopefully it made clear that even in a worst case situation we will pay off any and all fines and be able to move forward with very comfortable capital on hand.
Well, that went about as well as could be expected.
Do you think they will close?
Yes... you need to go put it out of its misery.
I mean it. We can't just leave it here.
Hello Maria, sorry we are a bit late. They were fine?
Great, thank you. We'll see you in the morning then.
I told you I wasn't going to just continue to stand around and let these people come and get me and my children. So unlike you who seems to be totally comfortable just standing around like some...
You know where I got it.
You've given me? You? Are you delusional? Do you even understand how ridiculous that makes you sound?
May I speak with you for a minute.
I understand you and your men have a job to do here. But we are in the middle of a seven-year-old's birthday party.

That's not a problem, as we have nothing to hide from you. It's just that, we recently moved to this area, and there are twenty guests in our house... please... can you give me five minutes so we can ask everyone to leave calmly before you come into my home?
I don't want them going through all this before I've had a chance to.
Thank you for coming. Here you go.
This is probably one that you are going to regret.
My husband is a very honorable man.
Really? I know you think you are just doing your job. But we are not what you think we are. And you have embarrassed him in front of his family and friends.

Good for you. My husband is not my father. Not even close. So if I were you I would start treating us with a little more respect or he'll make it our only mission to ruin you. This was very disrespectful...
And they haven't gotten the other guys?
Stop. I've told you guys not to push it this morning, this is not the morning to be doing this... but since the second you all woke up.
That's it Annie we've told you...
I'm not sure yet... but it's not as bad as they are saying it is...
You're going to see your little brother?
I'm not sure yet... but it's not as bad as they are saying it is... I guess I knew what I was doing.
You're going to see your little brother?
It was a lot of things all at once.
It will help. You could replace Peter's money and get him out of the deal.

Since 1971 I have been skimming money out of the company. Some years a little... others a lot. In the beginning it was just in case times got tough but then it was because you were taking all these chances... I didn't know what else to do... I couldn't risk having us be left with nothing.
It's as clean as every other dollar we've ever made.
I can clear it on the books.
Oh you are too much. You've been walking around your whole life like this all happened because of your hard work, good luck, and charm.
Replies.Didascalie: (Yelling, but controlled enough to not wake the kids.)

Replies.Reply: Oh... You have always been very good about not letting your ego get in the way of business. Don't start now just because it's me.
Abel...congratulations. Now cheer up. And can someone give me a tour of this place we just paid two million bucks for?
What a hell-hole this city is.
So how are we this morning?
Well I woke up feeling very good about this.
Well we are going all in... so now I love it.
Well, it was a hell of a job just getting them to this point. It's a good day for us. Take a walk around. Enjoy it for a second.
Lawrence. Thank you for seeing us on such short notice.
Our trucks. They are being robbed.
We have a serious security issue.
Our drivers are being put in danger.
I understand. But this is turning into an urgent and pressing matter for us.
No... let's not overreact. We don't even know what they are bringing against us. It could be total bullshit, and they are just trying to use us along the way. This isn't anything yet.
I'm sorry for the dramatic drop in but your phone doesn't seem to be working.
No... It looks like they are coming after us.
I still haven't seen it yet. But my guy in his office just gave me a heads up an hour ago. It's not good.
I'm not sure, a couple places probably.
Anna... sorry you've got no phone.
The D.A. is going to bring down charges on us tomorrow.
Right now they are just saying us.
It means we may have some accounting exposure where we have pushed things a little too far.
You always told us to push until we couldn't push any further. Well, we may have hit that line. So we will handle it and move on.
Let's not get ahead of ourselves here. You have always followed standard industry practices. We aren't even sure what this is yet.
And one more thing. I got a call from the union... O'Leary.
They've been getting word back from our drivers.
There is real concern about their safety.
I just think you should talk to them about it. Before it grows into something.
Can I talk with you both?
It's not good... It's bad  He takes out a folder containing the formal indictment and hands it to ABEL.
The first three counts are where we start to have real issues. They know what's going on in this industry. They say we are rigging scales and under-reporting income.
We are going to owe them some money.
That depends on a bunch of factors.
And there is one other thing. The bank...
We need to sit down with them immediately. I set a dinner. We need you both there to lay everything out and be totally up-
Seems like all the way back to when you bought out Anna's father.
He's been wanting to talk to you for days.
He feels very strongly about this.
I don't think he fully understands it.
I guess I'm not even sure exactly what you are suggesting.
He feels very strongly about this.
I don't think he fully understands it.
I will try to talk with him.
I guess I'm not even sure exactly what you are suggesting.
The drivers' security aside... this shit is starting to have a very significant financial effect on us here. It can't continue.
I'm not sure we are in a position to say that.
Do you want to go for a walk?
It is looking like we must do this.

That's true, until its not. And the last person in the world right now that we need working against us is the president of the fucking teamsters. This company is out of business in a month if he gets these guys to walk. We are running out of cash.
The union provides a handgun and a permit to every one of the drivers.
Would you put everything at risk to stand by that.
Why do you want this so badly?
That's not what I mean. Why did you want it so badly in the first place? It was a risk... always.
You don't know? Have you ever thought about it?
I didn't mean have you ever thought about that place...
I mean have you ever thought why you want it so badly?
We have to get going, we need them to show up.
Did you have a chance to look over the outline that I sent over?
Abel would like to speak with him.
Of course we are turning you in.
And what things do you know?
I strongly suggest you think that through before you answer it.
They say they have you firing four shots, is that right?
Good. Your background check with us says you have never been arrested, is that true?
Because no bank will touch us right now. So we can't close on the new property. And he's going to lose everything on his deposit.
This is a lawyer who will meet you when they bring you to the station.
I'm late. I will meet you at four.
We didn't think he'd react that way.
So are we... it's very sad. He was very close to Abel.
I'll show this to them. He'll never go for it, but it's a start.
I know... I will present it to him.
I understand. The kid went out and got his own gun. This was not us.
He wants to talk to them. We've been trying to set up a meeting.
Well here it is. It's just a first pass.
I know. It's just a first offer.
He's going to get us the meeting.
If we are cutting deals, we can't have anything new come up at the last minute.
We need to find him... Lawrence needs him.
I don't know why but I guess I never realized we even had this view from back here.
So why is it you want this land?
It has been difficult for you to get me here, no? Over a year?

There are many like it around? And thanks to all these tests you paid for, we now know it is as much of a mess below the ground as it is above. My people have looked at your books, I know this is a lot of money for you, so why have you kept on us so... just for this ugly and polluted little piece of the earth.

Well, I am in the garment business so I appreciate that sentiment. But I inherited this land from my uncle. Sadly he had no children of his own. He was the one that let them build these tanks here. So this place can do little for me...
Yes. This contract here, your lawyers have fully reviewed it?
And you have brought the money?
So you realize you have only thirty days to close this transaction?

I want you to know this up front. I am a very fair man but I believe in honoring contracts. You will fulfill your end of this contract and the property is yours. If you can't we will keep your money and will sell it to your competitor who has been chasing us almost as badly as you have. I like you, but know that the only reason I am choosing you is because of the favorable terms of this contract. So this is business... and when you sign this....
Well then, let's see this money, and then I will sign these papers.
It's a difficult time to do business.
I'll give you three more days. Then it's over.
It's being replaced, as I mentioned to your wife, that was an error on our part. Congratulations on your home.
Well, I'm sorry about that. Once the owner or an owner's representative files the claim form in Corona she's yours... again.
No need, these guys always wear gloves.
I'm not exactly sure, I just got here at four. My shift is actually up.
There have been a series of hijackings of bulk-fuel delivery vehicles.
It has been brought to our attention that it might be beneficial on your end to resolve this issue in a time sensitive way.
So we have prepared an offer for you to review.
Just a touch off the side Jimmy.
I know I am. So I hear congratulations are in order?
You got yourself in contract over there.
Thirty day close I hear, you better be.
I saw a couple of your trucks over in Rego Park the other day.
My father struggled for years before he broke in there.
What can I do for you?
I had nothing to do with that.
I've just been buying this stuff off these guys, it was only a couple loads, I don't know who they are. I would never do that.
Abel, I wasn't the only person buying this shit.
So I heard about your rig getting picked off again.

We should probably get together to discuss this and go over some of the preventative measures that we've been taking. We haven't had an incident since November. It doesn't do any of us any good to have this kind of attention brought to us.
So I think I may have seen one of your new trucks the other day.
Out near here, at the Miller Road diner?
The driver looked like a member of the Hitler Youth. I haven't seen a teamster that blond and blue-eyed since I was a kid.
That's new territory for you, no?
Welcome to the neighborhood. You should be proud.
It's a pretty cool machine, isn't it?
I was paying a guy five bucks an hour to do this with me last year.
Well, I'm sorry, that must have been scary... what can I do.
A bunch of thugs invaded our home when I was a baby... My mother was there with us... My brother remembers it. Nothing happened.
Yes... When are you closing on the terminal?
I know you do. My father is in jail... as you know. And I have always wanted to conduct myself differently than he did.
Almost exclusively, yes. But I know why he did what he did. Because at the time it's easier.
Yes it is. You are a good man. I will see what I can find out. This isn't good for any of us.

Um...
